options.name: Innate Cosmic Magic
options.description: Learn 2 Beginner and 2 Novice Spells from the Cosmic School of magic

options.name: Free Action : Cosmic Charge
options.description: You spend 2 Power to Charge a Cosmic Spell that is being Channeled. If under Direct Starlight, this charge does not consume power.

options.name: Free Action : Cosmic Wrath
options.description: You spend one Power and make an infused Melee or Ranged Attack. If in Direct Sunlight, the Physical Damage of the Weapon is converted to Fire. Otherwise, the Damage becomes Arcane.

options.name: Armor of the Cosmic Knight
options.description: Gain +1 Block while wielding a Shield and +1 Physical Mitigation when wearing Medium or Heavy armor.

options.name: Weapons of the Cosmic Knight
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Ranged, Slashing, Piercing and Crushing Weapons

options.name: Action : Flight of Ahkaris
options.description: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a Magical Flight Speed of 4 while in Direct Sunlight or Starlight. Each time you use Cosmic Wrath or Cosmic Charge Free Actions, this effect is extended until the end of your next Turn.
